<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crystalline Cloud](/Feats.aspx?ID=2485) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aphorite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=335" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Crystalline Dust](/Feats.aspx?ID=2480)

</column>

---

When you use Crystalline Dust, you can spend one additional action to disperse the motes as a 10-foot-radius cloud centered on you instead of as haze; the activity gains the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait. All creatures within the cloud become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it.
name: Crystalline Cloud
